The Journal of Industrial Ecology bụ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ a na-enyocha kwa ọnwa na-ekpuchi gburugburu ebe obibi ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ bụ Wiley-Blackwell bipụtara ya maka Ụlọ akwụkwọ Yale maka ebe obibi  ma bụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ nke International Society for Industrial Ecology. Onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ bụ Reid Lifset
Dị ka Journal Citation Reports si kwuo, akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ nwere mmetụta nke 6.946 n'afọ 2020.
A na-edobe akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ma depụta ya na:
